item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Monday 03/18/2013 week's location is:

Delaney's Tap Room, where they believe that the greatest pleasure of dining is the coming together of great friends, service, food, and beverages. When what you're drinking meshes with what you're eating, it's pure magic. And when you throw in good friends and great music... Heaven!  You're in for a treat at Delaney's Restaurant & Tap Room as you discover beer and wine pairings with real, American cuisine that will make your mouth sing!

The Manager Cheri has generously offered Exclusively to our meetup group the following specials:

Drink specials they are offering us on March 18, 2013 in the Tap Room from 6-8 $4 select draft beers, $4 select wine(one red, one white) we also have $1 beer starting at 8:00.

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Gail will serve as the contact for this evening. You can try my Cell at 203-824-9869, texting is fine as well.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text Gail at 203-824-9869. We're also probably amongst the largest groups in the bar area
item.name: Happy Hour 3/18: Delaney's Tap Room!
